author: cnbc.com
title: Carriage Services Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
HOUSTON, April 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Carriage Services, Inc. (NYSE:CSV) today announced that its Board of Directors on April 26, 2018 declared the quarterly dividend of 7.5Â¢ per share payable on June 1, 2018 to common share record holders as of May 14, 2018.
Carriage Services is a leading provider of funeral and cemetery services and merchandise in the United States. Carriage operates 178 funeral homes in 29 states and 32 cemeteries in 11 states.
SOURCE Carriage Services, Inc.
For any investor relations questions, please contact Viki Blinderman at 713-332-8568 or Ben Brink at 713-332-8441 or email InvestorRelations@carriageservices.com .
